author: EXM7777
text:
i tested Gemini 3 for a few hours and it's a good writing model, but...

looks a LOT like ChatGPT. same patterns, same buzzwords, same everything (it suffers from the "ChatGPT accent")

it does follow instructions well though... you can clean it up and get solid copy, SEO articles, linkedin posts

it made me realize something about Kimi K2 - that thing produces natural, unique style with dead-simple prompts and almost no refining

very impressive
